input.sentences: nearby my house there are some old structures that look like time was stopped in the 50s or 60s .
i thought this sign was interesting .
this old gas station was eerie as you could almost hear the cars coming and going .
i wanted to capture these pictures before new and modern developments take over such as this nearby one .
output.sentences: The cafe's and diners were made like this year's aho.
A lot of motels used to be connected to the diner or cafe.
The gas station is totally deserted.
I couldn't live here , I would want my house to be different than the others.
